TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi WebClass extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")

summary.span: 使已升级的 Visual Basic 6.0 项目能够在 ASP.NET 中运行。

span.span: Enables upgraded Visual Basic 6.0 projects to run in ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 Visual Basic 6.0`WebClass`项目升级到 Visual Basic，它将转换为[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]网站项目。When a Visual Basic 6.0 `WebClass` project is upgraded to Visual Basic, it is converted to an [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] Web-site project. 声明添加到项目： 一个用于`WebClass`，一个用于每个`WebItem`并`Template`中`WebClass`项目。Declarations are added to your project: one for the `WebClass` and one for each `WebItem` and `Template` in the `WebClass` project. 一个`Page_Load`事件过程添加到项目。A `Page_Load` event procedure is added to the project. 这将创建第一次`WebClass`对象，然后每个对象`WebItem`并`Template`与 Visual Basic 6.0`WebClass`项目。This creates first a `WebClass` object and then objects for each `WebItem` and `Template` associated with the Visual Basic 6.0 `WebClass` project. 最后，在`Page_Load`事件的过程中，您将看到对调用`WebClass`运行时兼容性： 。Finally, in the `Page_Load` event procedure, you will see a call to the `WebClass` Compatibility runtime: . 这使运行时能够呈现请求 URL 中指定。This enables the runtime to render the specified in the Request URL. 此代码添加到已升级项目的唯一的新代码，仅用于模拟 Visual Basic 6.0 的基础行为`WebClass`运行时。This code is the only new code added to your upgraded project and serves only to emulate the underlying behavior of the Visual Basic 6.0 `WebClass` runtime. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类由升级工具升级 Visual Basic 6.0`WebClass`投影到[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]网站项目。The class is used by the upgrade tools to upgrade a Visual Basic 6.0 `WebClass` project to an [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] Web-site project. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]
